site_name: The BothyAvenue House17 East End RoadLondonN3 3QE
decision_conditions: Roof not to be used as balcony
Listed Bldg Wrks to match extg
description: Change of use from Class D2 to Class D1 (Therapy and Training Centre). Single storey infill extensions to North and South Courtyards, following demolition of existing outbuildings in South Courtyard. General Refurbishment as approved consent F/01798/13, with revised roof design to new courtyard infill extensions (slope, atrium glazing and additional roof-lights . Amendments to South Courtyard External Wall Openings to comprise retention of an existing window opening (previously approved for blocking in) and the lowering of a window cill to create new double doors (previously approval for single door through partial lowering of cill
